text: Rafael Salguero Sandoval (born 3 December 1946) is a Guatemalan football administrator and a former member of the FIFA Executive Committee. In 2016, Salguero pleaded guilty to multiple corruption charges, as he admitted accepting a bribe in return for his vote for the 2018 World Cup. After spending three years under house arrest, he was eventually fined 100,000 CHF and banned from FIFA for 7 years. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:FIFA officials Category:Living people
title: Rafael Salguero
